content: hey @WG-polonius :wave: I forgot about a previous commitment and I don't think I'll be able to attend tonight's meeting. (Niko might not be able to attend either IIRC). In any case, here's my async update for this week (self.update().await): I didn't have time to do more work on the rustc test suite results, unfortunately :/ I mostly spent it preparing the NLL crater runs and triaging the first one (the 2nd one is almost done but has been delayed).
Let's see if there even is a meeting then
I won' tbe able to attend either
I'll try to answer @Albin Stjerna's questions above in a bit, though
yeah then async updates will probably be sufficient this week
from my side: started looking into instrumenting rustc to dump measurements
also, i'm on vacation and plan to spend some time on this this week as the weather is either heave rain or really heavy rain so hopefully i make some progress
and there may be an increased chance of questions from my side...
